label: Rotating nodes twist local pins
reason: Requires Wolfram Alpha API, experimental data, or advanced computation not yet implemented
note: PENDING: Rotating nodes twist local pins. Validation: Space = torsion fluid
pythonCode:
from core.FormulasRegistry import get_registry
reg = get_registry()

# Values from SSoT
b3 = reg.b3                      # 24 - Pin cage dimension
chi = reg.chi_eff                # 144
roots = reg.roots_total          # 288

# Frame dragging: rotating mass twists local pin structure
# Lense-Thirring precession from torsion in V7 manifold
pin_twist_factor = b3 / chi      # 24/144 = 1/6 twist coupling
frame_drag_scale = pin_twist_factor / roots  # Suppressed by bulk

# Space behaves as torsion fluid near rotating masses
verified = pin_twist_factor == 1/6
